q1.title: Does the code output Hello World! ?

q2.title: Did your peer set text = 'Marvin'? (single or double quotes are fine)

q3.title: For each string that your peer displayed without using strings, give 1 point

q5.title: Does the output match 'the car exceeded the speed limt'?

q6.title: 1 point if output matches, 1 point if your peer can output Pecos without using names[4]

q7.title: Ask your peer how they were able to achieve a correct output on each line. For matching output and correct explanation for every line give 1 point.

q1.title: Set speed = 60 and run the code, output should not say 'over the speed limit'. Set speed to 61, output should say 'over the speed limit'. If both conditions are met, select yes.

q2.title: Run my_function() if output displays 'Hi Marvin!', select yes.

q3.title:
Run my_function('Toto')
my_function('Fifi') if output displays 'Hi Toto!
Hi Fifi!', select yes.

q4.title: Test the following code: print(calculate(15,'/',5)). The output should show 3. Run your own set of tests with addition, multiplication and division. If everything works as expected, select yes.

q5.title:
Test the following code: print(check_string('Hello World!'), check_string('The yes string'), check_string('Three four five')). The output should be: No!
Yes!
No!

q6.title: Does the output match the expected output? Does the code match the code snippet? If so, select yes.

q7.title: Check if the output matches the example output. Add 'Egypt' and 'Zambia' to the list, the output should now also include 'Come and visit Egypt' and 'Come and visit Zambia'. If all checks are passed, select yes.

q8.title: Run the code multiple times, is the output random?

q9.title: Does the code show the current time correctly?

q6.title:
Does your peer's discord bot able to react a tick and emoji to message using the command $react?
(1 point if react only a tick, 2 points if react a tick and random emoji)

q1.title:
Section 1: Print the keys and the values as shown in the output example.
Section 2: List all the available keys in the database.
Section 3: Delete a key and print the updated list.
(1 point for each section. EX: If only 2 sections are completed then scale 2 for your peers)

q2.title:
Section 1: Add one element in fruit
Section 2: Add two elements in dessert
Section 3: Delete one of the elements in dessert
Section 4: List and show all the keys and values available
(1 points for each section. )

q3.title:
Section 1: Create a new key in database using if-else statement
Section 2: Add 'Good Luck' as a value in the key
Section 3: List and show the value available
(1 points for each section)

q4.title:
Does your peer's discord bot able to add a new message to the database using the command $new [your message here]?
(If the message is successfully added, the bot will return: New encouraging message added as shown in the output example)

q5.title:
Does your peer's discord bot able to list all messages stored in database using command $list?
(Choose no if the list is with 'ObesrvedList' problem)

q6.title:
Does your peer's discord bot able to delete a new message to the database using the command $delete [index of the message]?
(If the message is successfully deleted, the bot will return: 'Encouraging message deleted' as shown in the output example)

q7.title:
Does your peer's discord bot able to delete specific message from database and show the updated list of messages using the command $del_list?
(1 point for delete function or list function, 2 points for both but with 'ObesrvedList' problem, 3 points for exact output example)

q1.title: Does your peer's discord bot able to scrape the first paragraph from the website using the command $scrape?

q2.title: Does your peer's discord bot able to scrape the correct row in the table from selected website using the command $programming?

q3.title:
How many elements does your peer's discord bot able to scrape from the table using the command $programming?
(1 point for each element)

q4.title: Does your peer's discord bot able to scrape the Currecy name (Ex: USD) and Exchange rate from the website using the command $currency?

q5.title:
Does your peer's discord bot able to scrape the Job Title, Company Name and Salary from selected website?
(1 point for each element)

q6.title:
Section 1: Does your peer's discord bot able to scrape and compile the 1st and 2nd job's info from selected website using command $job?
(1 point for each job's info)
Section 2: Does your peer's discord bot able to send the scraped job list an embed message form using the command $job?
(1 point for embed message)

q7.title:
Section 1: Your peer's discord bot able to scrape the movie name (1 point) and storyline (1 point) from selected website.
Section 2: Your peer's discord bot able to send out an error message when no movie name was entered when using the command $movie [enter movie name] (1 point)
(Scale 3 if the 3 requirements are fullfilled, scale 2 if only 2 requirements are completed.)
